page.title: 02EDUCATION IN MADDERTY
page.content: { MADDERTY PRIMARY SCHOOL This is a one teacher rural school with 14 pupils aged between 5_12 years.The Head Teacher is Mrs.O.C.P. Ross.The school was modernised and a new extension was built in 1963. It is a single_storey school with two classrooms a gym hall,dining-hall and school kitchen where lunches are prepared by Miss Keron ,school cook. There is a large grassed playing field outside, where games and sports are held. Visiting teachers of art, music,needlework and P.E. call once a month. A remedial teacher calls weekly. On leaving this school pupils go on to Crieff High School or Morrison's Academy.
